actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5728 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to vacation leave in connection with a tour of duty outside the continental United States.

summary.text: Denies a Federal employee stationed in Alaska and between tours of duty outside the continental United States travel expenses for leave to his actual residence within the continental United States if such employee has accepted such expenses once after the enactment of this Act. Allows travel expenses more than once for between tour of duty leave if an employee is stationed at a hardship post in Alaska. Exempts agreements entered into prior to the enactment of this Act to provide travel expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5728 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to vacation leave in connection with a tour of duty outside the continental United States.
